text: V was a pretty great game, but unfortunately Konami ditched the series creator after Suikoden III, and although they eventually asked him back to finish up the series' epic plot he said it was impossible given the deviations from his plan that were done in Suiko IV and V (Basically there was too much ground to cover for one game).  Would have loved to see that final battle against the power of the Circle Rune, but alas it will never come to pass...
